column5: Oh.. and sorry Phil... she's tooooo young for you !!!  (thanks for putting some laughs to the week lads and Geoff again thanks for the wheel chair!!)
You're talking about the girl in the top post of this thread right????

I'm pretty sure that's the look I get when I find out that someone else is paying for lunch and I could have had anything! That or we were talking about Lloyd's pants again! Or, maybe it's when I realized I had left the gloves at home! HH

I think it's when you relized how wickedly awesome my shirt was!  Toooo young, come on, love has no boundries....but wait....Daddy has shot guns... ok.. your right.  Seriously she is a cutie.  What a solid bunch of young'ns you and Leah have, you have to be proud!
No prob on the wheel chair Wayne, I'm glad it's gone to a good home.  Thanks again for lunch and all the laughs!
DAmm, Phil, I think you're right! Not everyone can get away with wearing a shirt like that! HH
That's what I'm talk'n bout. (in my best napoleans bro's voice)
But did you say it while trying to bite your ear Phil?
LMAO.. ok I am going to hell for that one...

You guys are too much!!  Nice to see everyone having a good time and a few laughs, just what Wayne and the family needed I'm sure. Speaking of "nice shirts" You, Phil and I still have to have our "nice shirt" day of fishing.
Amazing the friends you can make hanging out in cyber space... and most of them aren't pedophiles...
Phil couldn't handle that one Albert !!!
oh ya huh. Remember my dating site. www.plentyofphil.com
That site address seems to have erectile dysfunction Phil !
